name: Unverified on Twitter
description: Hides the blue verified checkmarks on Twitter, but not the yellow ones.
additional_info:
***** NOTE *****
Should work on all browsers that support user styles, but for Firefox, until https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=418039 is resolved, you will have to manually change a configuration to make this work:
1. Go to URL: about:config
2. Search for: layout.css.has-selector.enabled
3. Double click it to change it to "true"
***** NOTE *****
